title: HELLO woe
content:
写一些Hexo博客记忆流程

⬆⬆⬆⬆⬆⬆⬆⬆⬆⬆[^npm]
npm需要的步骤npm install -g hexo-cli











hexocleanhexo init <folder>.├── _config.yml├── package.json├── scaffolds├── source|   ├── _drafts|   └── _posts└── themeshexo cleanhexo ghexo d



#Git
git remote origin main

title: Makeups
content:
针对Home Achieve 404 问题_config.ymlurl设置为: https://u-4862.github.io
themes/next/_configmenu:  home: / || home  #about: /about/ || user  #tags: /tags/ || tags  #categories: /categories/ || th  archives: /archives/ || archives  #schedule: /schedule/ || calendar  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap  #commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat
  如上显示的配置下会遇到%20 404 问题  须将/ 与 || 间的空格删去  如下：
menu:home: /|| home#about: /about/ || user#tags: /tags/ || tags#categories: /categories/ || tharchives: /archives/|| archives#schedule: /schedule/ || calendar#sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap#commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat
